Football: UEFA Conference League - match: Jagiellonia Białystok - KuPS Kuopio
programme.desc: At the halfway point of the regular phase of the Conference League, Pride of Podlasie is in thirteenth place, which guarantees seeding in the play-off phase.Adrian Siemieniec's players remain undefeated, but they cannot be proud of their last performance.They only drew 1-1 with Macedonian Shkendija and scored the equalizing goal in the tenth minute of added time.Jagiellonia has a match against KuPS Kuopio, which, like itself, has five points.The Finnish team will take the field in Białystok encouraged by their 3-1 victory over Slovan Bratislava in the previous round.

programme.title: UEFA Europa League Archive
programme.sub-title: Odense - Wisła Kraków 01.12.2011 - sezon 2011/2012
programme.desc: In the program, viewers will see fragments of memorable matches played in the UEFA Europa League.From the 2009/2010 season, this competition replaced the previous UEFA Cup.The authors pay special attention to matches involving Polish clubs.The first Polish team to win the right to play in the LE group stage was Lech Poznań, later Wisła Kraków and Legia Warszawa also achieved this feat.The greatest success so far was promotion to the 1/16 finals of Lech in the 2010/2011 season, Legia and Wisła in the 2011/2012 season and Legia Warszawa in the 2014/2015 season.

Football: UEFA Conference League - match: Omonia FC - Raków Częstochowa
programme.desc: The Medals are one of three teams in the Conference League that have not yet been defeated in the regular round.The Częstochowa team has already secured their place in the knockout phase, but they do not intend to be satisfied with that.They are counting on direct promotion to the 1/8 finals, which will give them a place in the best eight at the end of the league phase of the competition.Before the clash with Omonia, coached by former Legia coach Henning Berg, they are in third place in the table.The team from Nicosia is fifteenth and has eight points, three less than Raków.

programme.desc: Loic Le Marrec's team will face the leader of Group E - Lube Civitanov - in the fifth round of the Champions League.The first clash between these teams ended with a certain victory for Lube (3:0), which has not lost even a single set in the most important competitions since the beginning of the current season, effectively moving away from PGE Projekt Warszawa, second in the table.The Montpellier HSC VB team is still fighting for second place, which will directly qualify for the play-off phase.However, the hosts made this task more difficult for themselves, losing in the previous round to PGE Projekt Warszawa (0:3).

programme.desc: After eighteen OBL rounds, only GTK Gliwice and Miasto Szkła Krosno are lower in the table than Czarni Słupsk.Recently, the band has been led by Ivica Skelin.The Croatian is supposed to protect him from relegation from the top league.A victory over the Polish champion, Legia, could become a turning point for the inhabitants of Słupsk this season.The problem is that it will be very difficult to achieve it.Their rivals are in good shape, as evidenced by three victories in a row.Moreover, the hosts will play weakened.Aigars Skele will not play due to injury.

Studio Milan Cortina
programme.desc: Summary of events in the Olympic arenas, with particular emphasis on the performances of the White and Reds.The results of individual competitions of the XXV Winter Games will be commented by experts, including:Wojciech Fortuna, Tomasz Sikora, Apoloniusz Tajner, Katarzyna Niedźwiedzka and Patrycja Maliszewska.The program will include reports from reporters.The news straight from Italy will be delivered by: Marcin Lepa, Michał Białoński, as well as Tomasz Kalemba, Artur Gac and Tomasz Lejman.The group of hosts of "Studio Milan Cortina" consists of: Jerzy Mielewski, Maciej Kurzajewski, Przemysław Iwańczyk, Aleksandra Szutenberg and Paulina Czarnota-Bojarska.

programme.desc: El Tornado de Cuba, Osleys Iglesias tied his fate with Poland.Since December 2021, he has appeared in galas organized by Polsat Boxing Promotions three times and emerged victorious three times.The talented Cuban's opponent will be a very experienced boxer from Argentina.35-year-old Ezequiel Maderna has 35 professional fights, 27 of which he won.Recently, however, he has not had a good streak and has suffered three defeats in a row.In March 2022, he was defeated by, among others, Paweł Stępień.
